lines.line: In the harsh battlefield, a young military cat mascot found purpose among the soldiers who loved him dearly.
The commander had rescued him as a kitten, becoming the mother figure he never had.
They were inseparable, even during the most dangerous missions.
Until that fateful day when disaster struck their convoy.
The cat watched from base as helicopters rushed to evacuate the wounded.
But his commander never returned from the rescue mission.
Days passed as the lonely cat wandered the empty corridors of the base.
At the memorial service, he was the last one remaining at the site.
Until a kind soldier noticed his grief and extended a comforting hand.
Sometimes family isn't who we're born to, but who finds us when we need them most.

parsed_script.full_script: In the harsh battlefield, a young military cat mascot found purpose among the soldiers who loved him dearly. The commander had rescued him as a kitten, becoming the mother figure he never had. They were inseparable, even during the most dangerous missions. Until that fateful day when disaster struck their convoy. The cat watched from base as helicopters rushed to evacuate the wounded. But his commander never returned from the rescue mission. Days passed as the lonely cat wandered the empty corridors of the base. At the memorial service, he was the last one remaining at the site. Until a kind soldier noticed his grief and extended a comforting hand. Sometimes family isn't who we're born to, but who finds us when we need them most.
